name: seed-unphrase
description: Monorepo for seed phrase concealer CLI and web app

scripts.build: pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/lib" build && pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/cli" build && pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/web" build && pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/web-secure" build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/lib" clean && pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/cli" clean && pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/web" clean
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/lib" typecheck && pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/cli" typecheck && pnpm --filter "@seed-unphrase/web" typecheck
